sentences.sContent: He moved to another city last August.
sentences.sContent_eng: He moved to another city last August.
sentences.sCn: 去年八月，他搬到另一座城市。

sentences.sContent: That night in August, waiting for the Rolling Stones to come on stage, we felt like rebels.
sentences.sContent_eng: That night in August, waiting for the Rolling Stones to come on stage, we felt like rebels.
sentences.sCn: 在那个八月的夜晚，在等待滚石乐队登台演出时，我们有种造反的感觉。

sentences.sContent: They make a huge migration from the north to the south of the US, mostly starting in August and the other way around in the spring.
sentences.sContent_eng: They make a huge migration from the north to the south of the US, mostly starting in August and the other way around in the spring.
sentences.sCn: 大部分是从八月开始，它们开始进行巨大的迁徙，从美国的北部到南部，而到了春天又沿相反方向回来。

trans.tranOther: the eighth month of the year, between July and September
